name: TOWN (Paracortex)
description:
You are in Town, but you’re itching to get out of this drab, stuffy place. Unfortunately, the gateway is locked, and the Oracles hold the keys.  Seek them out and answer their riddles to find your way free!

TOWN is an old school text adventure with a unique twist: you move around in first-person view with a “3D” ASCII text display. Press ‘?’  in the game for help.
